column5: I've been killing the big walleye on Boysen reservoir in Wyoming. They do work really well. The best two colors are pearl chartreuse and firetiger.

Was up at nipawin 2 weeks ago, Saw 3 guys pulling Cranks and they Smashed the walleye. I asked what are you boys using one said PKLURES. Those cranks stole the show.. anyone ever use these or know where to get them?
Did you happen to notice what size they were using or the colors and how deep they were fishing them. thanks

They were in 21 to 26 feet right at the ledge and the Crank was holographic and looked to be 4 inches maybe a little longer. At one time they were fighting 2 walleye one was at least 10 lbs. He said later it was 13 lbs but I am not sure.
I Don't know where in Canada But we used them in Sak ND And Killed them There a Great Bait We Also Use there Jigging spoons down here and have had some great results
Try www.pklures.com. Hope these are what you may be looking for.
Yes thats them Thanks will place my order today. 30 walleye in 4 hrs with most over 5 lbs is enough proof for me. They were the yellow ones. Thanks
I was just on their website and don't see any yellow crankbaits.Maybe the Chartreuse color? Thanks. Any idea on how deep they troll ?
They were right on the ledge and thats 18 to 25 ish. Got mine on the way thanks.
As per your past post you mentioned a yellow crankbait. I see no Yellow on it. Thanks
They were the Pearl Chartreuse. From what I saw I was only 20 ft away but thats what it looked like.
